entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-03-13
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Test Failure tracing\\eventpipe\\enabledisable\\enabledisable\\enabledisable.cmd #83359
  • How to force System.Text.Json deserializer to throw an exception when property is missing in JSON? #83357
  • Existing behavior of AndAlso and OrElse in DLR is wrong #83350
  • Loop condition vs initial guard check impacts bounds checking #83349
    8.0.0
  • Intermittent build break caused by test-watchdog project #83346
  • performance issue with SetTag in Activity with large number of tags #83345
    Future
  • Can't build in an ARM64 Windows machine, fails in crosscompontents step #83343
  • Can make http2 request from a Android device #83344
  • [API Proposal]: SubStream #83340
    8.0.0
  • IPv6 multicast, multicast group joins on not selected network adapter with .net SDK installed #83336
  • jitstress-random-libraries: Assertion failed 'addr->TypeIs(TYP_BYREF)' #83333
    8.0.0
  • jitstress-random: Assertion failed 'node->OperIsLIR()' #83332
    8.0.0
  • [mono][perf] Remaining AOT Linux x86-64 perf issues after RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan<T> #83330
    Future
  • [mono] Change bound delegates dependency of bound_method + delegate_type to use just delegate_type #83329
    8.0.0
  • Do async state machines ever have Equals/GetHashCode called? #83323
  • Test failure JIT/superpmi/superpmicollect/superpmicollect.sh #83320
    8.0.0
  • NativeAOT type instantiation sharing #83318
    Future
  • Test failure System.Diagnostics.Tests.PerformanceCounterCategoryTests.PerformanceCounterCategory_InstanceExists_Static #83317
    8.0.0
  • Test failure System.Numerics.Tests.Matrix4x4Tests.Matrix4x4CreateShadowTest02 #83316
  • Add validation to SetHWIntrinsicId to help validate correctness #83315

Closed

  • Roslyn analyzer assembly loading with NativeAOT #83355
  • Native AOT classlib compiles with [DLLImport° as cheating dynamic library #83353
  • Remove System.Drawing dead code #22394
    Future
  • Stream Facade Pattern and Stream enhancements #39601
    Future
  • .NET NativeAOT x64 builds on macOS adds dependency on @rpath/libswiftCore.dylib instead of correct install path #79454
  • Wrong error message formatting for IDX10653 (System.Security.Cryptography) #83347
  • Investigate adjusting herustics for unrolled block copies/initialization #82529
    Future
  • [tvOS] System.Drawing.PrimitivesTest.RectangleTests.RectangleFConversionTest failed #60172
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR tests on Mono runtime : crash running JIT/Regression/JitBlue/GitHub_23791/GitHub_23791/GitHub_23791.sh #34385
    8.0.0
  • CoreCLR tests on Mono runtime : Failures in GC/API/* tests #35250
    8.0.0
  • JsonSerializer.Deserialize<T> returns invalid object when called by TypeConverter within AWS Lambda Test Tool #44763
    Future
  • The callback for the Hot Reload MetadataUpdateHandlerAttribute does not invoke. #82625
  • AOT - Cannot use System.Reflection on type named `AktifBarkod.AktifPOS.Mobil.EkranDiğer.Ana.AnaPage` #78638
    8.0.0
  • Crash on startup on Android in Release when referencing a class with non ascii characters from a class library #82187
    8.0.0
  • ServiceProvider deadlock when recursive resolving scoped services from another thread #81689
  • The default name of the configuration file is not uniform #83022
  • Make it possible to systematically disable console output. #83283
  • Unhandled exception inside Interop+OpenSsl.AlpnServerSelectCallback causing the process crash #81588
    7.0.x

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: Add missing 'MadeChanges = true' in gtSplitTree #83360
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement JsonSerializerOptions.TypeInfoResolverChain. #83358
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove System.Drawing.Common from runtime #83356
    area-System.Drawing
  • Adding support for Vector512 bitwise operations: And, AndNot, Or, OnesComplement, and Xor #83354
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, arch-avx512
  • [wasm] Fix threading startup after emscripten bump #83352
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript
  • [NativeAOT] Unify common cases of Array.Copy with CoreCLR #83351
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Implement HResult swapping for generated COM methods. #83348
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • [release/7.0] Fix special sweep issue for workstation #83342
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Fixing a bug that causes us to mistakenly demote a gen2 region to gen0 #83341
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Add property to get owner composite executable #83339
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Override Write(Span) for CryptoStream to clear arrays before returning to pool #83338
    area-System.Security
  • [Mono] Add more binary op intrinsics for ARM64 mini JIT #83337
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [loader] Does find_method_in_class really see null method entries? #83335
    area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • [browser][debugger] Cleanup runtime_ready tests #83334
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [Codespaces] Fix prebuild by using newer dotnet sdk #83331
    area-Infrastructure
  • Reduce number of gen 2 GC under high memory load #83328
    area-GC-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Remove VersionSuffix from servicing builds #83326
    Servicing-consider, area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, 7.0.x
  • Fix spurious exception while compiling optimized code #83324
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] Various jiterpreter optimizations; implement CALL_HANDLER; don't abort for some icalls #83322
    arch-wasm, area-Codegen-Jiterpreter-mono
  • Add x86 intrinsics to improve CRC32 performance #83321
    area-System.IO, community-contribution

Merged

  • JIT: Remove LclVarDsc::lvExactSize and LclVarDsc::lvSIMDType #83307
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use `MethodTable.Of` in generated valuetype methods #83325
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 679: Build ID 2133979 #83240
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Constant folding for RuntimeInformation.IsOSPlatform(OSPlatform) #83308
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Shared helpers for creating framework-dependent/self-contained apps in host tests #83291
    test-enhancement, area-Host
  • Unify unroll limits in a single entry point #83274
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Remove the dotnet (1) man page #78229
    area-Host, community-contribution
  • replace redhawk with nativeaot #79217
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83273
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • [mono] Clean up the delegate ctor code. #83288
  • [mono][jit] Adding more arm64 SIMD operations, SIMD codegen with instruction table. #83094
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Override all write/flush methods on NullTextWriter #83293
    area-System.IO
  • [Mono] Fix address data emitted in the MonoProfilerGCRoots ETW event #83284
    area-Tracing-mono, community-contribution
  • Remove VersionSuffix from servicing builds #83311
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Fix culture-specific string comparisons in EventSource #83319
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing

Updated

  • JIT: Remove "add copies" phase #83310
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add new MemoryExtension.Replace(src, dst, ...) overload #83120
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [release/6.0] [mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83303
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • [System.Net] Introduce CIDR IPNetwork #82779
    area-System.Net
  • [release/7.0][mono] Use unsigned char when computing UTF8 string hashes #83302
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.x
  • Copy published crossgen2 in artifacts/tests #80154
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Enable mono runtime to handle SIGTERM like CoreCLR #82806 #82813
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • JIT: Stop relying on type handles in CSE #83306
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • runtime: add RIDs for anolis distro #66132
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution, Future
  • Try to get more info about a named mutex creation failure #83186
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Threading, Future
  • [JIT] ARM64 - Optimize `x < 0` and `x >= 0` #83176
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Create source generator for configuration binding #82179
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.0
  • Use IAttributeOperation for our attribute-based analyzers #83239
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, source-generator
  • JIT: Expand runtime lookups in a late phase #81635
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • CoreCLR support for InlineArrayAttribute. (struct layout part) #82744
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr
  • [release/6.0][mono] Disable DoublinkList/dlstack tests #83268
  • NoGCRegion Callback #82045
    area-GC-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation
  • [wasm][debugger] Debug CI #83266
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Remove S.S.Permissions reference from S.DirectoryServices #82453
    area-System.DirectoryServices, breaking-change, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, 8.0.0
  • Initial changes for GetLocaleInfoString #81470
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • Arm64: Combine if conditions into compare chains #79283
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add bundle tests that don't use the SDK #81187
    area-Host
  • [browser] wasm memory snapshot into browser cache #82049
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Test out new OSX 13 AppleTV queue #83272
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ObjectFactory should verify against a null serviceProvider #82739
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection, needs-breaking-change-doc-created, community-contribution
  • [mono][interp] Add intrinsics for BitOperations #82827
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • Another attempt to fix stress tests #83211
    area-System.Net.Http
  • JIT: Remove lvaPInvokeFrameRegSaveVar #83309
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • let user know working directory will be used as content root path by default #82445
    area-Extensions-Hosting, community-contribution
  • Produce IL3000 and IL3001 from NativeAOT compiler #83253
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Use an mrgctx for all gshared methods. #82981
    NO-REVIEW
  • Add support for Inline TLS field access in JIT #82973
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Reduce duplicity in GVM analysis #83250
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
